elements.title: Leeds Tiger (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that when the Leeds Tiger (pictured) went on display in Leeds in 1863 it was described as a "work of art quite as much as an object for scientific observation"?

elements.title: Grace Prendergast (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that New Zealand's Grace Prendergast was the highest-ranked female rower in the world in 2019?

elements.title: Bad Times at the El Royale (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Drew Goddard wrote the soundtrack for Bad Times at the El Royale into his screenplay so a studio would be forced to purchase the licenses for each piece of music?

elements.title: Sam Brownback's 2008 presidential campaign (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that during Sam Brownback's 2008 presidential campaign, he mentioned the yellow brick road in both the speech that began and the speech that ended his candidacy?

elements.title: Tehani Egodawela (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that shooter Tehani Egodawela was the third person selected from Sri Lanka to compete in the 2020 Summer Olympics?

elements.title: R. Bintoro (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that when R. Bintoro was put in command of the Papua Military Region, he wrote the lyrics for the military region's march?

elements.title: cadet scandal (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the cadet scandal of 1942 resulted in a widespread persecution of gay men in Buenos Aires?

elements.title: Robert Sacchi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Robert Sacchi, who played many Humphrey Bogart roles due to their physical resemblance, "never thought Bogie was too terrific-looking" and "wanted to look like Gregory Peck" instead?

elements.title: Cork (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Cork

Destination of the month

Pubs, Irish sports and a fort await you in Ireland's second city.

elements.title: Neuland (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Neuland

Off the Beaten Path

One of Paraguay's Mennonite colonies, there are also some interesting forts nearby to explore.

elements.title: Trans-Labrador Highway (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Trans-Labrador Highway

Featured Travel Topic

Come with us on a sub-Arctic road adventure past remote coastal fishing communities and endless forests.
